moves.1... Nf6 2. Bf4 d6 3. Nf3 g6 4. Nbd2 Bg7: Well this blocks the bishop but does give some support for e5
moves.7. Bd3 c5 8. h3 b6: The bishop will be released via b7
moves.9. O-O Bb7 10. Re1 Qc7 11. e4: Staking a claim for the centre
moves.11... e6 12. Nc4 Ne8 13. a4: Give black something else to think about
moves.13... e5 14. Bg5: The rook looks up for grabs
moves.21... Qd7 22. Nxd4: And then a pawn, black resigns
